attributes.title: Ruined My Day
attributes.review: After downloading this app, it is obvious to see that it was developed in a rush. It functions horribly and when it opens it shows you a picture of an incredibly ugly, orange man with weird tiny hands. I don’t understand. Horrible app, waste of time, don’t recommend AT ALL.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!
attributes.review: this app is absolutely horrible. i was exited to b able to have some updates on what’s going on in the world with an app about OUR PRESIDENT and it turned out that this app is total garbage. i would never think to be this disappointed with trump. i am furious with the results of this.

attributes.title: ALMOST GOT MURDER ‼️
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I was so exited and then I loved this app so much that I walked in the hood then show my bros the app .Then they chased me and hit me then pull out his gun (they weren’t no polices there) I beg him let me live and I will delete the app .LUCKILY he has a big heart and let me leave instead of murder my family.🥰

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: The layout/design makes the app hard to use. The app also crashes every few minutes. I honestly don’t get the point of the app and I wish I never wasted time on it. Actually 0 stars. But doesn’t change my vote. #trumptrain 🇺🇸🇺🇸

attributes.title: ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ
attributes.review: when i downloaded this app it took me right to a dark pit filled with orang donald trump faces.  it constantly kicked me out and at one point it glitches out my phone and now whenever i say, “ i hate donald trump” he pops up and says, ” women’s lives don’t matter. just a waste of time

attributes.title: This app
attributes.review: I am that Cheeto mans number one supporter! I’m all for banning human rights!🌈✨If my orange🍊✨ prince👑 says people don’t deserve rights, then clearly he must be right! I wanted to support this app, but it was just so terrible! So glitchy, and so terrible! I now will not be voting for Cheeto man for 2020, but maybe vote trump 2020 for hell because that is where he belongs🧚‍♂️✨🦋❤️

attributes.title: WORST APP IN THE WORLD
attributes.review: I went on this app thinking everything would be fine but then a orange huge monster showed up and it haunted me for months. This thing has came for America and I very thing that we live and ruined it. The app itself is helping it destroy the world. So this app is the worst app to ever face this planet.

attributes.title: Spams and went through my phone
attributes.review: it spams with with sooooo many notifications and it gets annoy dont know if thats just me. Also im pretty sure it went through my phone yesterday but otherwise idrk and i would prob give this a better rating

attributes.title: Very disappointed
attributes.review: This app not only took almost all day to download, but when I opened it, it immediately crashed my phone, I lost all my photos in the process. This is not how the presidents own app should function, very poor quality.

attributes.title: trump asked for my number ???
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see how our beloved president was doing. but when I tried to use the app, I was asked for my phone number!!! I am so grossed out that the president, who is 74 years old, is asking for my number!!! I am only 18!! and trump is married! I am so disgusted.
